AI Description: The r-backports package provides features and enhanced functionality for the R programming language by backporting new features found in recent versions of R to older versions of R. This allows users to access new functions and capabilities in older R versions to ensure compatibility with their existing workflows and packages.
Core Features: Backports New Features From Recent R Versions To Older R Versions, Enhances Compatibility With Existing R Packages & Code, Facilitates Access To Updated Functions & Capabilities
General Tags: R Package, Backporting, Compatibility, Functionality Enhancement
